name: Crazy Racing Car-Chase Driving
description:
Crazy chase drag racing on the beautiful asphalt road.
The car accelerates automatically, you just need to simply control the steering wheel, collect the Boost on the track, and drift, accelerate, and overtake.

Game features:
-Simple and smooth control
-Realistic drag racing and drifting experience
-Up to 10 beautiful worlds and 20 super luxury sports cars
-Track completion and trophy ranking

Take control of your steering wheel, show your drifting stunts, surpass other opponents, cross the finish line first, and win the final victory.
